definition: sweet words, beautiful phrases (idiom); hypocritical flattery

sentences.english: Do you whisper such sweet nothings to all the girls that you date?
sentences.chinese: 你对其他和你约会的女孩也说这些甜言蜜语吗？

sentences.english: I have been over the age of intoxication in cajolery.
sentences.chinese: 我已经过了喜欢听甜言蜜语的年纪。

sentences.english: Sweet words is not important any more .
sentences.chinese: 蜜语甜言已不再那么紧张。

sentences.english: Do not think that old couple, do not sweet talk and the romantic.
sentences.chinese: 不要以为老夫老妻，就不要甜言蜜语和浪漫了。

sentences.english: He can whisper mellifluous nothings in my ear.
sentences.chinese: 他可以整日在我耳边甜言蜜语。

sentences.english: E. g. : They sat in the corner all the afternoon, whispering sweet nothings.
sentences.chinese: 他们坐在角落里一下午在那儿甜言蜜语。

sentences.english: Do not believe the sweet words of that fair-faced man.
sentences.chinese: 不要相信那个小白脸的甜言蜜语。

sentences.english: Such sweet words hearkened . lo ! have I , that ask not .
sentences.chinese: 别问我，她说了多少蜜语甜言。

sentences.english: His words are always more candied than candid .
sentences.chinese: 他的话总是甜言蜜语的多过于正直的。

sentences.english: Fair words will not fill the belly.
Don't let his friendly words mislead you into trusting him.
sentences.chinese: 别让他的甜言蜜语骗取了你的信任。

sentences.english: They use beautiful words to win their father's trust.
sentences.chinese: 她们用甜言蜜语去骗取她们父亲的信任。

sentences.english: She wheedled five dollars out of her father.
sentences.chinese: 她用甜言蜜语从她父亲那儿骗去了五美元。
不要给我说些甜言蜜语了。

sentences.english: He remained impervious to all nell's sulks and blandishments.
sentences.chinese: 对尼尔的愠怒和甜言蜜语，他都无动于衷。

sentences.english: Tao never-failing honey you, sincere hand in hand every day.
sentences.chinese: 道不尽的蜜语甜言，不如真诚携手每一天。

definition: graceful words, flowery speech (idiom); elegant but insincere words/cheating wheedling/dishonest rhetoric
to pledge undying love (idiom); oath of eternal love/to swear by all the Gods
to pledge undying love (idiom); oath of eternal love/to swear by all the Gods
sweet words, beautiful phrases (idiom); hypocritical flattery
friendly advice/words spoken on sb's behalf/a good word/kind words/words that sound fine but are not followed up with actions
heart and mouth at variance (idiom); keeping one's real intentions to oneself/saying one thing but meaning sth different
see 月下花前[yue4 xia4 hua1 qian2]
